extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 3 and 6.0 units at the 200 level in RELS.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from RELS 353/6.0; RELS 354/3.0; RELS 355/3.0.

basic.description: An investigation into the techniques of critical reading and writing for research in Religious Studies.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Research Methods in Religious Studies
